channel.title: Why does it say java is not recognized as an internal or external command?
channel.description:
How come when I try to turn on zdiddy reloaded client is says: 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Please help thank you

item.title: Why does it say java is not recognized as an internal or external command?
item.dc:creator: @daone8 daone8
item.description:
@daone8 wrote:

No but i did on my other computer and it still says the same thing

Read full topic

item.title: Why does it say java is not recognized as an internal or external command?

item.description:

Um did you add CLASSPATH and PATH in you’re settings ?
